fix: Use Clean.csproj version as fallback instead of hardcoded 1.0.0

When NuGet API query fails, the workflow now reads the version from
Clean.csproj to determine the base version, preventing packages from
being downgraded to 1.0.0-ci.X instead of the correct 7.0.0-ci.X.
